func.title: CheckEffect

param.name: name
param.desc: Name of the effect without prepended 'Fx'.

param.name: target
param.desc: Target object of the effects to be notified. If nil, the global effects are notified.

param.name: priority
param.desc: Effect priority. Calls are made to all effects of equal or higher priority. If unspecified or 0, all effects are notified.

param.name: timer
param.desc: Interval for the timer calls. With nil, no timer calls are made and the effect stays on permanently until it is deleted by other calls.

param.name: var1
param.desc: First extra parameter to be passed to the effect callback.

param.name: var2
param.desc: Second extra parameter to be passed to the effect callback.

param.name: var3
param.desc: Third extra parameter to be passed to the effect callback.

param.name: var4
param.desc: Fourth extra parameter to be passed to the effect callback.

func.desc: Makes Fx*Effect (and in cases Fx*Add) callbacks to the specified list of effects, without actually creating any effect. The return value is -1 if another effect has rejected the call. If an effect accepts the call, the return value is the effect number of that effect.
func.remark: For examples and more information see the effects documentation.
